lek hawu­si­yen wishrama giya pasu ohu iru­dina pathraye niyojya karthru pada­wiya bara­ga­ththeya. 2006 di mul ‘mawbima’ pathraye aara­mbhaka pradhana karthru dhura­yata pathwima labuwe kuru­wita banda­raya. 2010 di shri lanka guwan widuli sansthawe upa­de­sha­ka­wa­ra­yaku lesa path karanu labu ohu, guwan widu­liye nawa­thama sanga­rawa ‘handa’ sanska­ra­ka­wa­raya da wiya.

ape sinhala jathiya athulu peradiga aarya jathin pradhana washayen suryaya mulkotagath adahili sampradhayan matha goda nanwi atha.ee wagema owunge parani jiwana ratawa godanagi aththe krushikarmanthaya mulika kota genaya.athithaye sitama owun thamange pradhana aswanna labagath kalaya thamayi me bak mase,bhagya mase kiyala kiyanneth ee hindama thamayi.ithin aswanna geta gaththa gaman ee aya thamange aswannata aarakshawa praweshama laba dunnu dewi dewathawunta puda sathkara kirimak karanawa.

purusha deha lakshana 1.digati dangili pihita athi thanaththa kalawata ladiya. 2.wishala das athi thanaththa an aya musawen mula karana athara, aniyam sambandhatha pawathwanu labayi. 3.sihin digati das athi thanaththa sthrin priyakaranneku wana athara, dhanawath pudgalayeku lesa salake. 4.nalale rekha thunak pihitana pudgalaya saukhya sampanna lesa digu kalak jiwath we. 5.nithara as piya helana thanaththa wanchakari kapati adahas athi pudgalayaku we. 6.digu nasayak pihita athi pudgalayan kalawata ladi, janadarayata path charitha bawata path we. 7.pathali nasayak athi thanaththa kuriru gathi lakshana aththeki. 8sihin nas pudu pihita athnam ohu wasanawanthaya. 9.wishala nas pudu pihita athnam an ayata garahana pudgalayeki. 10.nithara chalanaya wana das pihitanne nam nam ohu thikshana upakrama sahitha wu aathmarthakami, anyayan upayen rawata samajaye kapi penena pudgalayeki. 11.papuwe romakupa pihita athnam ohu karunawantha pudgalayeki. 12.shariraye romakupa pihita nathnam ohu awasanawanthaya. 13.sinindu roma pihita thibena pudgalaya anukampa sahagatha, sanwedi pudgalayaki. 14.ahi bami ekata yawi athi pudgalayage wiwaha jiwithaya ayahapathya. 15.ella watena swabhawaye thol pihita athi pudgalaya musawada pawasanneki. 16.udu rawula athi pudgalaya siyallan samaga suhadawa katayuthu karayi. 17.udaraya manawa watakuruwa pihita athi thanaththa wasanawantha, dhanawath saha prasiddha pudgalayeki. 18.udaraya idiriyata nambauru wu thanaththa siya abhimathartha kese ho itukara ganimata kriyakarayi. 19.rath pahayata huru das athi thanaththa ikmanin kopayata path we. 20.kawakara wishala kanpethi pihita athi thanaththa ugath, buddhimath saha sruju gathi athi ayeki.
